from sklearn.utils import shuffle
data_house_shuffle=shuffle(data_house,random_state=1)


X=data_house[data_columns]
y=data_house[house_target]
print(X.shape, y.shape)

(20640, 8) (20640,)



data_columns

['longitude',
 'latitude',
 'housing_median_age',
 'total_rooms',
 'total_bedrooms',
 'population',
 'households',
 'median_income']



from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split


X_training, X_test=train_test_split(X,test_size=0.2)
y_training, y_test=train_test_split(y,test_size=0.2)


print(X_training.shape,X_test.shape,y_training.shape,y_test.shape)


X_train,X_val=train_test_split(X_training,test_size=0.1)
y_train,y_val=train_test_split(y_training,test_size=0.1)
